thread.section_title: Steelers sign RB/KR Knile Davis | Steelers Wire
thread.title: Steelers sign RB/KR Knile Davis

author: Simon A Chester
title: Steelers sign RB/KR Knile Davis
text:
The Pittsburgh Steelers have made their second signing of the free agency so far with the news emerging of a deal with running back Knile Davis who visited the team on Monday.
We have signed RB Knile Davis.
MORE: https://t.co/XGY7zV6NGS pic.twitter.com/z96jE71BXu 
â€” Pittsburgh Steelers (@steelers) March 20, 2017 
News of the young running backs arrival into town only emergd a few ago and already Davis is under contract. It should be expected his signing will signal the end of the DeAngelo Williams era in Pittsburgh.
Related: 5 big cornerbacks for the Steelers to consider in the 2017 NFL draft
